snippet.title: Live Coding: Learning Ansible from Scratch
snippet.description:
It's time to learn how to use Ansible. We'll start from the beginning and figure out how to install it and perform basic tasks like running SSH commands, running shell scripts, and using an inventory file. We'll try to build a simple tool that will backup a directory

GitHub: https://www.github.com/DevDungeon
Support the stream: https://streamlabs.com/devdungeon
Join Discord: https://discord.gg/JWsSHJC
Get $100 credit for signing up to Digital Ocean: https://m.do.co/c/5ccd98162d85

Opening music:  Song: Buzzsaw (feat. Zircon), Big Giant Circles & zircon, Imposter Nostalgia
